summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1269 for the improvement of Taylor Avenue, from Mercer Street to East Queen Anne Drive, East Queen Anne Drive, from Taylor Avenue to Fifth Avenue North; Fifth Avenue North, from Galer Street to East Queen Anne Drive and from East Queen Anne Drive to Lynn Street; Bigelow Avenue, from Howe Street to McGraw Street; Lynn Street, from Fifth Avenue North to Bigelow Avenue; McGraw Street, from Bigelow Avenue to Fourth Avenue North; Galer Street, from Fifth Avenue North to Sixth Avenue North, all in the City of Seattle, by constructing therein water mains of proper dimensions, together with all necessary appurtenances, under Ordinance No. 13961 and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
